<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Physical Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6112) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 155 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Primal Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6097) or [Arcane Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6094)

</column>

---

You change form readily. Once per day, you can use a sorcerer spell slot to cast any common polymorph battle form spell of the spell slot's rank as if it were a signature spell in your repertoire. You can use the extra spell slot from either [Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=534) Evolution or [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=676) Evolution instead of a sorcerer spell slot.
name: Greater Physical Evolution
